0.1.0.desc: The build of ALBWR that started the z17 randomizer craise.
0.1.0.warn: The spoiler log in this build does not get generated properly for some reason. Only use this build if you don't want to use a spoiler log.

0.2.0.desc: The build of ALBWR that has some slight improvements over the base build. The higher you get with the versions, the better things get.

a0.0.2.desc:
alpha-0.0.2

glitched logic update for blacksmith cave, behind blacksmith cave, rosso cave, and DM Fairy Cave

a0.0.3.desc:
Lorule Portals open from the start
Ravio gives out Bracelet at the start
Glitched logic

a0.0.4.desc:
Glitched + Normal Logic Options
New [logic] option in the toml: glitched_logic (bool)

glitched_logic.comment: Place items using logic that potentially requires glitches to complete

0.0.5.desc:
Skip Hilda Blacksmith Text + Activate Map Swap icon
Skip Sahasrahla outside Link's House

glitched_logic.comment: Place items using logic that potentially requires glitches to complete

a0.0.6.desc:
start the game with Ravio's Shop opened
Maiamai available to be collected by default
skip Monster Guts/Horn/Tail first time dialogue
add Master Ore UI element
create new [behavior] setting portals_open (default is false)

glitched_logic.comment: Place items using logic that potentially requires glitches to complete

portals_open.comment: Opens up all of the cracks at the start of the game
